system.name: Fabulous Max
system.effect:
Trigger - Your Pokémon uses a Beauty-Type Move
Contest Effect: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.
Battle Effect: The move gains the keyword Burst 1 if Melee, or Blast 2 if ranged. If the move is already a Burst, Blast, or Cone, increase the size of the Move’s Range by 1. This does not cause a target to be hit multiple times. You may activate Fabulous Max only once per Pokémon per Scene.
